languages.text: {n}Сервомоторы разгоняются, их тяжелый гул становится громче, но почти сразу стихает. Техножрец обращается к вам.{/n} "Благословенный механизм сделал все возможное, инфо-файлы утеряны безвозвратно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сервомоторы разгоняются, их тяжелый гул становится громче, но почти сразу стихает. Техножрец обращается к вам.{/n} "Благословенный механизм сделал все возможное, дата-файлы утеряны безвозвратно".
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: {n}The servo-motors pick up the pace and their heavy thrum grows louder but stops almost immediately. The Tech-Priest turns to you.{/n} "The hallowed mechanism did all that was possible. The data is lost beyond recovery."
languages.original_text: {n}Сервомоторы разгоняются, их тяжелый гул становится громче, но почти сразу стихает. Техножрец обращается к вам.{/n} "Благословенный механизм сделал все возможное, инфо-файлы утеряны безвозвратно".

traits.locale_text: {n}The servo-motors pick up the pace and their heavy thrum grows louder but stops almost immediately. The Tech-Priest turns to you.{/n} "The hallowed mechanism did all that was possible. The data is lost beyond recovery."
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: {n}サーボモーターが速度を上げ、その重い低音がますます大きくなるが、すぐに停止する。技術司祭が振り向く。{/n}「聖なる機構は可能な限りを尽くしました。データは復元不可能なほど失われました」
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-motors pick up the pace and their heavy thrum grows louder but stops almost immediately. The Tech-Priest turns to you.{/n} "The hallowed mechanism did all that was possible. The data is lost beyond recovery."

traits.locale_text: {n}サーボモーターが速度を上げ、その重い低音がますます大きくなるが、すぐに停止する。技術司祭が振り向く。{/n}「聖なる機構は可能な限りを尽くしました。データは復元不可能なほど失われました」
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: {n}Les servomoteurs accélèrent la cadence et leur vrombissement sourd se fait plus intense, avant de s'arrêter soudainement. Le technoprêtre se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Le saint mécanisme a fait tout son possible. Malheureusement, les données sont irrécupérables. »
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-motors pick up the pace and their heavy thrum grows louder but stops almost immediately. The Tech-Priest turns to you.{/n} "The hallowed mechanism did all that was possible. The data is lost beyond recovery."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les servomoteurs accélèrent la cadence et leur vrombissement sourd se fait plus intense, avant de s'arrêter soudainement. Le technoprêtre se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Le saint mécanisme a fait tout son possible. Malheureusement, les données sont irrécupérables. »
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: {n}伺服电机加快了速度，沉重的嗡嗡声越来越响，但随后戛然而止。技术神甫转向了你。{/n}“神圣的机器已经尽其所能，然而里面的数据已经丢失，无法恢复。”
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-motors pick up the pace and their heavy thrum grows louder but stops almost immediately. The Tech-Priest turns to you.{/n} "The hallowed mechanism did all that was possible. The data is lost beyond recovery."

traits.locale_text: {n}伺服电机加快了速度，沉重的嗡嗡声越来越响，但随后戛然而止。技术祭司转向了你。{/n}“神圣的机器已经尽其所能，然而里面的数据已经丢失，无法恢复。”
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: {n}Los servomotores se aceleran y su tamborileo pesado se vuelve más fuerte, pero se detiene casi de inmediato. El tecnosacerdote se gira hacia ti.{/n} «El bendito mecanismo ha hecho todo lo posible. Los datos se han perdido de forma irremediable».
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-motors pick up the pace and their heavy thrum grows louder but stops almost immediately. The Tech-Priest turns to you.{/n} "The hallowed mechanism did all that was possible. The data is lost beyond recovery."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los servomotores se aceleran y su tamborileo pesado se vuelve más fuerte, pero se detiene casi de inmediato. El tecnosacerdote se gira hacia ti.{/n} «El bendito mecanismo ha hecho todo lo posible. Los datos se han perdido de forma irremediable».
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: {n}Die Servomotoren werden schneller, ihr tiefes Brummen wird lauter ... stoppt dann aber sofort wieder. Der Techpriester wendet sich zu dir.{/n} "Der heilige Mechanismus hat getan, was möglich war. Die Daten sind nicht zu retten."
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-motors pick up the pace and their heavy thrum grows louder but stops almost immediately. The Tech-Priest turns to you.{/n} "The hallowed mechanism did all that was possible. The data is lost beyond recovery."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Servomotoren werden schneller, ihr tiefes Brummen wird lauter ... stoppt dann aber sofort wieder. Der Techpriester wendet sich zu dir.{/n} "Der heilige Mechanismus hat getan, was möglich war. Die Daten sind nicht zu retten."
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: {n}Hizmotorlar hızlanıyor, ağır uğultularının sesi gitgide yükseliyor fakat neredeyse anında duruyor. Tekno Rahip, yüzünü sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Kutsal makine mümkün olan her işlemi gerçekleştirdi. Veri kayıp, temin edilmesi imkânsız."
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-motors pick up the pace and their heavy thrum grows louder but stops almost immediately. The Tech-Priest turns to you.{/n} "The hallowed mechanism did all that was possible. The data is lost beyond recovery."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmotorlar hızlanıyor, ağır uğultularının sesi gitgide yükseliyor fakat neredeyse hemen duruyor. Tekno Rahip yüzünü sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Kutsal makine mümkün olan her işlemi gerçekleştirdi. Veri kayıp, temin edilmesi imkânsız."
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630
